_header: Harkeneth all good men and still sitteth a-down
_description: ‘A lutel soth Sermun’ — fifty-four long lines in couplets, with occasional medial rhyme

OxfJesus29.First Lines:
Herkneþ alle gode men and stylle sitteþ a dunAnd ich ou
                    wile tellen a lutel soþ sermun…
OxfJesus29.Last Lines:
…Al so wis so he god is for hire erendyngeTo þe blysse of
                    heouene he vs alle brynge
OxfJesus29.Editions:
Morris,  Richard,

BLCottCalAIX.First Lines: Herkineð alle gode men and stille sitteþ adounAnd ich eou ƿule tellen a lutel sermum…
BLCottCalAIX.Last Lines: …Also wis so he god his for hire erndingeTo þe blisse of heuene he us all bringAMEN
